original_title: Cap'n O.G. Readmore Meets Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
overview: Cap'n O.G. Readmore and his friends are holding their Friday Night Book Club meeting on a rainy, eerie night. They select the story of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde and when the book is opened, Wordsy is kidnapped into the story and Cap'n O.G. follows to rescue him.
title: Cap'n O.G. Readmore Meets Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
